import { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { AppContext } from '../../context/context' import css from './Filters.module.css' import { HiOutlineSortDescending, HiOutlineSortAscending } from 'react-icons/hi' export default Filters => { const { filters, Filter, filterReset } = useContext(AppContext) const filterByGender = type => Filter({...filters, gender: type}) const sort = type => Filter({...filters, order: type}) const clearFilters = () => { console.log('clearFilters', filters) } return (
